== Part Information  ==
The CS:L Battery Boxes are available in two separate designs.  One is a complete print of the entire box, or the other is split into multiple files and will require the peices to be bonded together.

=== Instructions  ===
Recommended print settings 20% infill, minimum of 3 shell layers.
